full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

W6889-230156-GARRISON PETAWAWA ROADWAYS AND SIDEWALKS SNIC OPERATIONS RFP
===============================================

**Tender Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a service provider to undertake Snow and Ice Control (SNIC) Operations for winter road and sidewalk maintenance throughout Garrison PETAWAWA. This includes approximately 60 kilometres of roadway and 35 kilometres of sidewalks.

**Scope of Work:**

The service provider will be responsible for providing all labour, supervision, materials, tools, equipment, and fuel for SNIC Operations. The active SNIC operations season is from October 15 to April 15 each year. This is an annual service contract, invoiced over six months from November to April for each year of the contract.

**Mandatory Bidders' Site Visit:**

A mandatory bidders' site visit will be held prior to the awarding of the contract. Personnel security screening will be required prior to gaining access to classified information, assets, or sites.

**Contract Award:**

Canada intends to award one contract.

**Key Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: October 3, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 15, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: October 14, 2024

**Tender Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and the bid electronically.
* All bids must be received by October 3, 2023, at 14:00 EDT.
* Late bids will not be accepted.

**Background Information:**

The DND requires a service provider to undertake SNIC Operations for winter road and sidewalk maintenance throughout Garrison PETAWAWA. This includes approximately 60 kilometres of roadway and 35 kilometres of sidewalks. The service provider must have the necessary expertise and resources to provide this service.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:

Wayne Cook
Department of Public Works and Government Services
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
Phone: None
Email: [wayne.cook@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:wayne.cook@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
